amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to establish Cattle and Carcass Grading Correlation and Training Centers to limit subjectivity and increase the accuracy of grading cattle across the country.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to establish Cattle and Carcass Grading Correlation and Training Centers to limit subjectivity and increase the accuracy of grading cattle across the country.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
